title: wtf, why can't I connect to any gamr
body: Yesterday I was playin then as I was about to play my last gane a message popped up saying it is unable to connect to server whereas the loading screen should've been up. My internet is fine and I thought it was a one time thing. Now, today I get bans, attempt to remove it and the same fcking error appears!!! Wtf is going on?! I got bans for this and my laptop is perfectly capable of running lol.

replies.body: Though your net might be fine, it sounds like you're specifically having issues establishing a connection to the game server.  You should check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix and to make sure your network is stable.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to configure firewall settings in cases of a permission problem.  Let me know if you have any questions!
